Title: First records of some Asian macromycetes in Africa
Abstract:
This paper reports and discusses preliminary data on new
Asian macromycete species now recorded on the African continent and
collected for the first time in Niger during sampling conducted in the
southwestern region from 2008 to 2012. Descriptions and comments on
chorology, systematics, and closely related species are given for
Hymenagaricus subepipastus, Clitopilus orientalis, Tulostoma evanescens,
Termitomyces bulborhizus, and Volvariella cf. sathei.
